mapper.select: select 0 dept_no, null upper_dept_no, company_name dept_name, 0 ord, 0 depth, null last_dno from tbl_company where company_no = ${upperDeptNo}

select 0 dept_no, null upper_dept_no, tc.company_name dept_name, 0 ord, 0 depth, null last_dno, tc.company_no, (select count(*) from tbl_dept td where td.company_no = tc.company_no and td.depth = 1) lower_dept_cnt, tc.orga_no from tbl_company tc where tc.company_no = (select company_no from tbl_company where orga_no = #{companyNo}) union all
select td.dept_no, td.upper_dept_no, td.dept_name, td.ord, td.depth, td.last_dno, td.company_no , (select count(*) from tbl_dept where company_no = td.company_no and upper_dept_no = td.dept_no group by upper_dept_no ) lower_dept_cnt , (select tdm.orga_no from tbl_dept_mapping tdm join tbl_orga t on tdm.orga_no = t.orga_no where tdm.dept_no = td.dept_no ) orga_no from tbl_dept td where (td.upper_dept_no = #{upperDeptNo} OR td.upper_dept_no is null ) and td.depth = #{depth}
and td.company_no = (select company_no from tbl_dept dd join tbl_dept_mapping mm on dd.dept_no = mm.dept_no where mm.orga_no = #{companyNo})
and td.company_no = (select company_no from tbl_company where orga_no = #{companyNo})
and td.main_flag = true

select * from (
with recursive cte as( select x.orga_no, x.upper_orga_no, x.orga_type, x.main_flag from ( select t.orga_no, t.upper_orga_no, t.orga_type, case when t.orga_type = 'company' then (select tc.company_use from tbl_company tc where tc.orga_no = t.orga_no) when t.orga_type = 'dept' then (select td.main_flag from tbl_dept td join tbl_dept_mapping tdm on td.dept_no = tdm.dept_no where tdm.orga_no = t.orga_no) when t.orga_type = 'emp' then (select te.emp_use from tbl_emp te join tbl_emp_mapping tem on te.emp_no = tem.emp_no where tem.orga_no = t.orga_no) else false end main_flag from tbl_orga t where t.orga_no = #{orgaNo} ) x where x.main_flag = true union all select x.orga_no, x.upper_orga_no, x.orga_type, x.main_flag from ( select t.orga_no, t.upper_orga_no, t.orga_type, case when t.orga_type = 'company' then (select tc.company_use from tbl_company tc where tc.orga_no = t.orga_no) when t.orga_type = 'dept' then (select td.main_flag from tbl_dept td join tbl_dept_mapping tdm on td.dept_no = tdm.dept_no where tdm.orga_no = t.orga_no) when t.orga_type = 'emp' then (select te.emp_use from tbl_emp te join tbl_emp_mapping tem on te.emp_no = tem.emp_no where tem.orga_no = t.orga_no) else false end main_flag from cte c join tbl_orga t on t.upper_orga_no = c.orga_no ) x where x.main_flag = true )
with cte as ( select x.orga_no, x.upper_orga_no, x.orga_type, x.main_flag from ( select t.orga_no, t.upper_orga_no, t.orga_type, case when t.orga_type = 'company' then (select tc.company_use from tbl_company tc where tc.orga_no = t.orga_no) when t.orga_type = 'dept' then (select td.main_flag from tbl_dept td join tbl_dept_mapping tdm on td.dept_no = tdm.dept_no where tdm.orga_no = t.orga_no) else false end main_flag from tbl_orga t where t.orga_no = #{orgaNo} or upper_orga_no = #{orgaNo} ) x where x.main_flag = true )
select case when cte.orga_type = 'company' then (select tc.company_name from tbl_company tc where tc.orga_no = cte.orga_no) when cte.orga_type = 'dept' then (select tc.company_name from tbl_company tc join tbl_dept t on tc.company_no = t.company_no join tbl_dept_mapping m on t.dept_no = m.dept_no where m.orga_no = cte.orga_no) else (select tc.company_name from tbl_company tc join tbl_dept t on tc.company_no = t.company_no join tbl_dept_mapping m on t.dept_no = m.dept_no where m.orga_no = cte.upper_orga_no) end company_name , case when cte.orga_type = 'emp' then (select dept_name from tbl_dept td join tbl_dept_mapping tdm on tdm.dept_no = td.dept_no where tdm.orga_no = cte.upper_orga_no) else (select dept_name from tbl_dept td join tbl_dept_mapping tdm on tdm.dept_no = td.dept_no where tdm.orga_no = cte.orga_no) end dept_name , tem.emp_rank , te.username , te.emp_name , cte.orga_no , cte.upper_orga_no , cte.orga_type from cte left join tbl_emp_mapping tem on tem.orga_no = cte.orga_no left join tbl_emp te on tem.emp_no = te.emp_no ) x where x.company_name is not null
and ( emp_name like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR username like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') )
and dept_name like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
